wikipedia_page.main: Rhodri Lloyd (born 22 July 1993) is a Welsh professional rugby league footballer who plays as a second-row forward for the Swinton Lions in the Betfred Championship.He has played at representative level for Wales, and at club level for the Wigan Warriors and the London Broncos in the Super League,
